mention.text: Bluedorn said continued hot , dry weather
At least 60 Forest Service firefighters did not miss any hot spots Bluedorn said continued hot , dry weather
no holiday for firefighters from national forests in Wisconsin , Minnesota , Idaho and other states who were shipped to Michigan 's central Upper Peninsula to battle the Hiawatha blaze
